revision.text: Possibly: A Political Index to the Histories of Great Britain and Ireland; or, a complete register of the Hereditary Honours, Public Offices, and Persons in Office, from the earliest periods to the present time. By Robert Beatson, Esq;. (Edinburgh : Printed for the Author. Sold by William Gordon and William Creech, Edinburgh; and by G. Robinson, Paternoster Row, J. Murray, Fleetstreet, and J. Strahan, No 67. Strand, London, MDCCLXXXVI. [1786]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2423223~S1
